meanings.definition: A sudden, involuntary expulsion of air through the nose and mouth, often caused by irritation in the nasal passages.
meanings.sent1: The snee made everyone in the room jump.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stop my snee during the allergy season.
meanings.sent3: His snee sounded like a tiny explosion.
meanings.sent4: The snee was like a burst of air escaping a balloon.
meanings.sent5: The loud snee echoed in the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: To expel air suddenly through the nose and mouth due to irritation or a tickling sensation.
meanings.sent1: She tried to snee quietly during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: I always snee when I'm around dust.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to snee on purpose to get attention.
meanings.sent4: Her snee broke the silence in the library.
meanings.sent5: He had to snee so forcefully that he almost fell over.
